details:
io_uring: reinstate the inflight tracking

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit bba36a27c38650eefc79d18c33a0acd0dcbeabb8, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit d5361233e9ab920e135819f73dd8466355f1fddd. For more details please see the references link.
